title: Check Out These Awesome Sega Genesis Displays Featuring Sonic, Street Fighter, & More
description: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 Console Heroes Green Hill Zone Cartridge Diorama $20 | Releases July 15 Preorder at Amazon Sonic the Hedgehog 3 Console Heroes Carnival Night Zone Cartridge Diorama $20 | Releases August 2025 Preorder at Amazon Street Fighter 2 Console Heroes Ken Stage Cartridge Diorama $20 | Releases August 2025 Preorder at Amazon Altered Beast Console Heroes Graveyard Cartridge Diorama $20 | Releases August 2025 See at Amazon Sega Genesis Console Heroes Display $50 | Release October 2025 See all Sega Genesis Console Heroes Sets at Amazon If you miss the era of cartridge-based gaming, you'll want to check out Wilder Toys' new line of Console Heroes Sega Genesis Cartridge Dioramas. These miniature displays resemble popular Sega Genesis game cartridges, and unfold to unveil tiny diorama scenes from the games they're inspired by. So far, five Sega Genesis displays have been announced, including sets based on levels from Sonic the Hedgehog 2, Sonic the Hedgehog 3, Super Street Fighter 2, Altered Beast, and a larger set that resembles the Sega Genesis console itself.The cartridge sets are all available to preorder now for $20 each. The Sonic 2 display launches July 15, while the Sonic 3, Altered Beast, and Super Street Fighter 2 sets launch in August. The Sega Genesis console display will be available for $50 later in October, though preorders are not currently available at Amazon. Check out more info on all the Console Heroes Sega Genesis Cartidge Dioramas below. Sonic the Hedgehog 2 Console Heroes Green Hill Zone Cartridge Diorama $20 | Releases July 15 This diorama, based on Sonic the Hedgehog 2's iconic Emerald Hill Zone level, features Sonic and his trusty sidekick, Tails. Preorder at Amazon Sonic the Hedgehog 3 Console Heroes Carnival Night Zone Cartridge Diorama $20 | Releases August 2025 This piece features Sonic and Knuckles the echidna striking familiar poses in a miniaturized scene from Sonic the Hedgehog 3's classic Carnival Night Zone. Preorder at Amazon Street Fighter 2 Console Heroes Ken Stage Cartridge Diorama $20 | Releases August 2025 This display features figures of Ryu and Ken squaring off in a striking recreation of the Super Street Fighter 2's Sega Genesis cartridge art. Preorder at Amazon Altered Beast Console Heroes Graveyard Cartridge Diorama $20 | Releases August 2025 The Altered Beast Console Heroes Cartridge Diorama recreates the infamous graveyard stage from the beginning of the game. It includes figures of the resurrected Roman Centurion in his werewolf form and the Aggar boss monster. See at Amazon Sega Genesis Console Heroes Display $50 | Release October 2025 The Sega Genesis Console Heroes Display includes a fold-out Diorama based on the console, plus a cartridge storage tray for storing other Console Heroes dioramas (or even real Genesis carts), plus four figures, including:Super Sonic figureMech Suit Robotnik figureDeath Bringer figureMr. X figureWhile final images have not been revealed, several photos of the set have surfaced online, and it looks to be a much bigger that the cartridge dioramas. Preorders are not yet available at Amazon, but we expect it'll show up ahead of its October 2025 release, so keep checking the retailer's listings. html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

If you miss the era of cartridge-based gaming, you'll want to check out Wilder Toys' new line of Console Heroes Sega Genesis Cartridge Dioramas. These miniature displays resemble popular Sega Genesis game cartridges, and unfold to unveil tiny diorama scenes from the games they're inspired by. So far, five Sega Genesis displays have been announced, including sets based on levels from Sonic the Hedgehog 2, Sonic the Hedgehog 3, Super Street Fighter 2, Altered Beast, and a larger set that resembles the Sega Genesis console itself.

The cartridge sets are all available to preorder now for $20 each. The Sonic 2 display launches July 15, while the Sonic 3, Altered Beast, and Super Street Fighter 2 sets launch in August. The Sega Genesis console display will be available for $50 later in October, though preorders are not currently available at Amazon. Check out more info on all the Console Heroes Sega Genesis Cartidge Dioramas below.

Sega Genesis Console Heroes Display

$50 | Release October 2025

The Sega Genesis Console Heroes Display includes a fold-out Diorama based on the console, plus a cartridge storage tray for storing other Console Heroes dioramas (or even real Genesis carts), plus four figures, including:

  • Super Sonic figure
  • Mech Suit Robotnik figure
  • Death Bringer figure
  • Mr. X figure

While final images have not been revealed, several photos of the set have surfaced online, and it looks to be a much bigger that the cartridge dioramas. Preorders are not yet available at Amazon, but we expect it'll show up ahead of its October 2025 release, so keep checking the retailer's listings.
